meta.title: COVID-19 School Operations Guidance - 03/23/20 | Idaho State Board of Education

meta.name: description
meta.content: The Idaho State Board of Education makes policy for K-20 public education in Idaho, to create opportunity for lifelong attainment of high-quality education, research, and innovation.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Idaho higher education, Idaho colleges and universities, Idaho scholarships, Idaho technical schools, Idaho K-12 education, Idaho education policy, Idaho education governance
